skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
MW Smart. Smart home, Easy living.
The MW Smart App is specially designed for a smart home control system that connects your smart LED lights, even if you are at home or on the other side of the world.

Support devices:
Light bulb, down the lamp, floor lamp, ceiling lamp, cabinet lamp, dimmer, business lamp, switch – For now they just have light bulb products, the following product category is their plan.

Product link:
https://www.mwledlighting.com/all-product/mrsd612w-rgbw

Setup Instructions:
Follow these steps to connect Alexa to your MW lighting bulb device:
https://www.mwledlighting.com/ Download MW lighting Android or IOS app page login, use any third-party login options provided or register to use your email address. The device is provided by scanning the device's unique QR code. After the setting is successful, the device will connect to the Internet through wi-fi and be associated with the logged-in user. Provide some user-friendly names for your device. The same name will appear in Alexa In the Alexa application, search for "MW lighting skills" and log in with the same credentials you used in MW lighting. Once the link is successful, Alexa is allowed to discover your device. Once the device is successfully discovered and set up, you can start using Alexa to control them.
The following controls are supported:
switch control: 
"Alexa, turn on the boiler switch" "Alexa, turn off the boiler switch" 
light control: 
"Alexa, turn on the kitchen light" "Alexa, turn off the kitchen light" "Alexa, set the kitchen light to 50%" light 
color control: 
"Alexa set the kitchen light to red" "Alexa set the kitchen light to green"
For any inquiries, please email (info@mwlightingusa.com）
